goal: To summarize an interesting open source project in a fun, accessible, and easy-to-understand way for beginners.

blueprint.name: The Project Hook (30s)
blueprint.technique: Start with what the project is and its most exciting feature to grab the listener's attention immediately.

blueprint.name: Key Features (1 min)
blueprint.technique: Briefly list the 2-3 main features or problems this project solves.

blueprint.name: Feature Deep Dive (2-3 mins for each 2-3 key)
blueprint.technique: For one key feature, explain: 1. What it does. 2. Why it's useful. 3. Use a simple analogy to make the core concept understandable.

blueprint.name: Who Is This For? (1 min)
blueprint.technique: Explain who would benefit most from this project. Is it for developers, designers, students, etc.?
